issue.title: www.palmbeachpost.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.palmbeachpost.com/story/news/2025/06/24/todd-julie-chrisley-photos-prison-release-trump-pardon/84330881007/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.palmbeachpost.com%2Fstory%2Fnews%2F2025%2F06%2F24%2Ftodd-julie-chrisley-photos-prison-release-trump-pardon%2F84330881007%2F) ### Comment ``` Absurd block (still) by site that requires disabling ad blocker in order to proceed These types of site blockers STILL persist and prevail over AdGuard's purported solution which, in my experience, has been and is 100% of the time. Why am I still paing AdGuard for an annual subscription?! ``` ``` Username: rockettnyc@yahoo.com ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/db1r4dpttdcs4s0k44kg0wkg4kogg00dxxdg72b23w.png?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

comment.body:
> [@r1172464137](https://github.com/r1172464137) If not related to filters, please test with disabled Tracking Protection and AdGaurd Extensions(userscripts). 如果与过滤器无关，请在禁用跟踪保护和 AdGaurd 扩展（用户脚本）的情况下进行测试。
> 
> I don't see any issues我看不出有任何问题
> Details  细节
> 
> ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/03ea1de3-e634-4764-9303-a80417c49963)

我录制了一段视频，视频中可以明显看出打开AdGuard和关闭AdGuard的区别
I made a video in which it clearly demonstrates the difference with AdGuard on and with AdGuard off.

![AdGuard.mp4](https://tc.cecily.eu.org/file/1750983789064_AdGuard.mp4)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://hd.kinopoisk.ru/film/685c4999e91b4e558efc242a0a7b2e5d?from_block=kp-button-online](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhd.kinopoisk.ru%2Ffilm%2F685c4999e91b4e558efc242a0a7b2e5d%3Ffrom_block%3Dkp-button-online) ### Comment ``` почему то не запускается плеер и не воспроизводится видео при включенном AdGuard, когда отключаеш расширение полностью в панели расшерений то всё работает ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: Clean parked domains in AdGuard Mobile filters list

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer; - [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed; - [x] This is not an ad/bug report. ### Problem description The [parkedDomain2](https://github.com/List-KR/parkedDomain2) reports that the following domains are parked:
List

gamers-luck.com kbj.tv ero-doujinshiworld.com ero-mangacafe.com eromanga-moeerolibrar.com erocomic-hunter.net eromanga-sevendays.net hentaivn.net gufengmh8.com rumus.co.id shazi8.com qhdi.com hkdm688.com geeksokuhou.net fmhua.com fashion101.in wxrw123.com rp5.co.uk xhamster20.com xhamster23.com xhamster34.com runnergamesch.com kfiopkln.com inclk.com a2dfp.net

### Proposed solution Check each domain and remove if it is actually parked. ### Additional information https://github.com/List-KR/parkedDomain2
